key_risks: Legal and governance concerns, including a stockholder agreement dispute and post-spin-off challenges
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities, such as product security issues and reputation risk
Market and competitive risks, including intense competition and dependence on MSPs and SMBs
Ethical and social concerns, particularly data leak risks
controversies: Stockholder agreement dispute with private equity firms Silver Lake and Thoma Bravo
Critical vulnerability (CVE-2023-30297) in N-central platform exposing users to MITM attacks
social_issues: Data leak risks and broader cybersecurity challenges affecting clients and the industry
governance_issues: Governance provisions granting significant control to lead investors, potentially undermining shareholder rights
